roleset.name: emit bubbles rapidly, make noise while doing so
roleset.note: FIZZ-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fizz' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 43.2 and 47.2, Framenet entry Motion noise. (from fizz.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: fizzy pop
example.text: The little radio fizzes as other boats want to see if we have found any fish -- spotting location is everything in this sport.
example.arg: as other boats want to see if we have found any fish
